definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 当今中国数学界面对的大难，便是缺乏领导者。

sentences.english: Today's companies should think of high-earning singles as a key market.
sentences.chinese: 当今的企业应该把高收入的单身族当成重要的市场。

sentences.english: Today madam Gao is wearing a red skirt.
sentences.chinese: 当今高老师穿着一件红裙子。

sentences.english: In the world of today, absolute majority countries have parties and exercise party politics.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界，绝大多数国家都存在政党，实行政党政治。

sentences.english: Ecotype waterscape residential district is the trend of modern resident design.
sentences.chinese: 生态型水景住宅是当今住宅设计的一大趋势。

sentences.english: Currently, the Japanese are experiencing an age of having few children in families, which influences the development of higher education greatly.
sentences.chinese: “少子化”是当今影响日本社会的主要人口问题之一。

sentences.english: Nowadays weight-losing has become popular among young and middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 当今女性减肥已成为一种时尚。

sentences.english: Think of the endless opportunity our connectedness provides.
sentences.chinese: 想想我们当今社会的连通性给我们所带来的无限机遇。

sentences.english: Most people turn to countless sources of information these days.
sentences.chinese: 当今大多数人要面对不计其数的信息源。

sentences.english: Today’s upheaval did not occur from nowhere. The seeds were planted earlier.
sentences.chinese: 当今的剧变并非凭空发生，这些种子早已埋下。

sentences.english: SamuelLing, The Meaning and ContemporarySignificance Confessing the Inerrancy of Scripture Today.
sentences.chinese: 林慈信，《认信圣经无误的重要性和当今适切性》。

sentences.english: The potential curricula is a new task and hotspot of the current teaching research?
sentences.chinese: 潜在课程是当今教学研究的一个新课题和热点。

sentences.english: When (Juventus keeper Gigi) Buffon retires, the best goalkeeper will be Igor Akinfeev.
sentences.chinese: 当布冯退役后，当今第一门将将会是阿金费耶夫。

sentences.english: Now let's enjoy the tape of a fiwimous popular singer Miss Tianzhen.
sentences.chinese: 目下当今欣赏一下在大歌星田震的磁带。

sentences.english: This theory has become the theoretical framework for China’s current qigong and health preservation studies.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论已成为当今气功健身研究的基础理论。

definition: main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
the last few years/last several years/recent years
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
